snippet.title: Christmas Cookies Recipe in Tamil | Butter Biscuit Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make butter cookies recipe in tamil. These butter cookies bake perfectly and are perfect for the holidays. The butter biscuits are so yummy and have a nice texture to them. You can bake these biscuits in a wide variety of shapes for different festivals.
#butterbiscuits #buttercookies #biscuitrecipe 

Friends, please do try these butter biscuits recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
makes 25 Butter cookies
1/2 cup Sugar (100 g)
150 g Butter (3/4 cup)
1 Egg yolk
1/2 tsp Vanilla extract
1.5 cup Maida (185 g)
1 tbsp Corn flour (10 g)
pinch of Salt
Oven: Bake at 175 C /350 F for 12-14 min
Pan: Bake on medium heat for 14-15 min min

We Wish You a Merry Christmas by Twin Musicom is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Artist: http://www.twinmusicom.org/

snippet.title: Instant Vada Recipe in Tamil | 10 நிமிடத்தில் உடனடி வடை
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make instant vada recipe in tamil. This vadai can be made very quickly without soaking or grinding. This instant vadai will be great for getting a quick snack for the evening time. In this recipe we are using aval (poha) and potatoes. The potatoes can be easily cooked in the microwave for 8 minutes and the vadais can be ready to go in under 10 minutes.

#instantvada #instantvadarecipe #vadairecipe 

Friends, please do try this instant vada recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

1 cup Aval
2 Potatoes
1/2 Onion
2 tbsp Coriander leaves
1 spring Curry leaves
1 Green chilli 
1 tsp Ginger
1/4 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Cunin powder
3/4 - 1 tsp Chilli powder
1 tbsp Besan flour
2 tbsp Rice flour
required Salt
oil for frying

snippet.title: Plum cake recipe in Tamil | Christmas Cake Recipe in Tamil | Fruit Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make plum cake recipe in tamil. This Christmas cake is made with dried raisins and cherries which are soaked in syrup and this cake is loaded with dried fruits and nuts. The plum cake is baked at a slightly lower temperature (325F/160C) so that it cooks fully without getting burnt on the outside. This version of plum cake is made with eggs but I also have another version
Eggless plum cake :- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bAwCkDqYIxA

#plumcake #christmascake #plumcakerecipe 

Friends, please do try this christmas plum cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family during the holiday season. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Sugar(100 g)
1/4 cup hot water

For spice mix:
1/2 cup Sugar
2 Cinnamon
4 Cloves
4 Cardamom
For Cake Batter: 

1 cup Butter (200 g)
2.5 cup black raisins(350 g)
1 tsp orange zest
1/2 cup Water
1/2 cup prunes (or cherry)(50 g)
1/ cup Cashews (50 g)
2 cup Maida (250 g)
1 tsp Baking powder
1/4 tsp Salt
Bake at 325 F / 160 C for 75-85 min

snippet.title: Bonda Chaat Recipe in Tamil | TamilNadu Chaat Recipe | Bonda with Peanut Crunch
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make a bonda chaat recipe in tamil. Instead of a samosa chat in this recipe we are going to fry some bondas and then make a quick chaat recipe. The addition of sev and peanut crunch (kadalai podi) adds a different contrasting taste and texture to the recipe. This chaat recipe has a wide range of flavors and textures which make it wonderful to eat as a evening snack.
#chaatrecipes #streetfood #bonda 

Friends, please do try this bonda chaat recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For Peanut crunch:
1/2 cup Peanut
1/2 tsp Oil
4-5 dry red chillies
3 garli cloves
1 small Tamarind
curry leaves
required Salt

For Curd:
1 cup Curd
1/4 tsp Salt
1 tsp Sugar
1/2 tsp Cumin powder

For Mint chutney:
1/2 cup Mint leaves
1/2 cup Coriander leaves
1 Green chilli
1 small piece Ginger
1 tsp Lemon juice
required Salt
required Water

For Vada:
1 cup Urad dal
1 Onion
1 tsp Ginger
2 Green chillies
Curry leaves
10 pepper crushed
1/2 tsp Asafoetida
required Salt

For garnishing:
chopped Onion
chopped Coriander leaves
Sev
chilli powder

snippet.title: மைசூர் பாக்கின் தங்கை | Mysore Pak (different version ) | Mohanthal Sweet Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make mohanthal recipe in tamil. This is a version of Mysore pak which is very famous in Gujarat. The besan flour and the sugar syrup combination is wonderful for many indian sweets and this sweet recipe also uses the same combination. Compared to the traditional mysore pak, this recipe uses less ghee and adding milk enhances the rich taste of this sweet recipe.
#mysorepak #mysorepakrecipe #sweetrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this different sweet recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 cup Besan (200 g)
1/2 cup milk
3/4 cup Ghee(150 g)
1 cup Sugar (200 g)
1/2 cup Water
1/2 tsp Cardamom powder
pinch of Salt
nuts for garnishing

snippet.title: இட்லி பொடி | Oil oozing Idli Podi Recipe in Tamil | Thengai podi
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make idli podi recipe in tamil. This is a coconut idli podi / thengai podi which is made with roasting coconut and then grinding it. This idli podi is very tasty and oozes oil when the coconut is ground in the mixie. This podi is great for idli/ dosa.
#idlipodi #podi #dosapodi 

Friends please do try this idli podi recipe at home and serve it with some steaming hot idlis. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 tsp Oil
2 inch Ginger (1 tbsp chopped)
10 Garlic (2 tbsp chopped)
15 small onion(4 tbsp chopped)
1/2 tsp Oil
10 Red chillies
1/2 tsp Oil
2 cup grated Coconut
3 piece Tamarind
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
required Salt
tags: how to make idli podi in tamil

snippet.title: கார்த்திகை தீபம் அப்பம் | Sweet Appam Recipe in Tamil | Karthigai Deepam Instant Rava Appam In Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make karthigai deepam appam recipe in tamil. This is a soft sweet appam which can be made instantly in no time. This appam is made from rava and rice flour and creates a soft and fluffy center when fried in oil. When frying the paniyaram we have to make sure that the oil is at moderate temperature so that they get cooked evenly before getting burnt on the outside. This sweet appam / paniyaram is very popular during the karthigai deepam festival.
#appam #sweetappam #instantappam 

Friends, please do try this instant appam recipe at home and share it with your friends and family during this festival season. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
makes 12 Rava appam
1 cup Jaggery (150 g)
1/2 cup Water
1 cup Rava
1/2 cup coconut
1/4 cup Rice flour
1/8 tsp Salt
1/2 tsp Cardamom powder
1 tsp Ghee
required water
Oil for frying

snippet.title: KFC Fried Chicken Recipe in Tamil | Crispy KFC Bucket Chicken Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make KFC style fried chicken recipe in tamil. This KFC bucket chicken  is famous for its flavorful coating. The long marination of chicken pieces keeps the chicken soft and juicy while it develops a crispy crust. For this fried chicken we can use either chicken drumsticks or chicken thighs. The thick coating of batter creates a textured golden colored fried chicken which tastes absolutely delicious.
#kfcchicken #friedchicken #kfcrecipe 

Friends, please do try this KFC chicken recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For marinating the Chicken:
1/2 cup Curd
1 cup milk
1 Egg
1 tsp Ginger paste
2 tsp Garlic paste
2 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp pepper powder
2 tsp Salt
juice of 1/2 Lemon
4 chicken thigh(cut into 2) total 8 pieces
2 chicken drumstick

For the Coating: 
1 cup Maida
1/2 cup Corn flour
1 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp cumin powder
1/2 tsp Pepper powder
1 tsp Garlic powder
1 tsp Onion powder
1 tsp Salt or as required 
Oil for frying

snippet.title: பஞ்சு போண்டா | French Sweet Bonda Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make cream puffs recipe in tamil. This is a french sweet recipe which can be stacked to make  Croquembouche / profiterole. These sweet bondas are fully and can be filled with custard cream. They are very airy and light and have a delicate taste.
#sweetbonda #creampuffs 

Friends, please do try this sweet bonda recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients Makes 30 Puff :

1 cup Milk
1/2 cup Butter (100 g)
1 cup Maida (125 g)
1 tbsp Sugar
pinch of Salt
4 Eggs
Bake at 200 C / 375 F for 24-26 min

For the custard cream:
2 egg yolks
6 tbsp Sugar
3 tbsp Corn flour
1.5  cup Milk
pinch of Salt
1 tsp Vanilla extract
2 tbsp Butter.

snippet.title: Bread Halwa Recipe in Tamil | Kalyana Veetu Style Bread Halwa Recipe | No Fry Bread Halwa Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make bread halwa recipe in tamil. This bread halwa is served during marriage festivals and is a popular sweet recipe. In this version of bread halwa we are going to make the halwa without frying the bread. This reduces the amount of oil in the halwa and improves the taste and texture of the halwa. Bread halwa is the easiest of halwas to prepare and can be made in no time. It is a very tasty evening snack and can  also be served during the meals.
#breadhalwa #breadhalwarecipe 

Friends, please do try this bread halwa recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients for No fry Bread halwa recipe:
2 cup Milk
8 slice Bread
2 tbsp Ghee
2 tbsp Cashews
2 tbsp Raisins
2 tbsp Oil
3/4 cup Sugar
1 cup Water
1/2 tsp Cardamom powder
2-3 tbsp Ghee

snippet.title: Kalaan Pakoda | Crispy Mushroom Pakoda Recipe in Tamil | Evening Snack Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make mushroom pakoda recipe in tamil. This crispy pakoda is a perfect evening snack which goes well with tea/ coffee. For making this pakoda we are going to get some thin strips of mushroom and then coat them in a batter and fry them. The crispiness from the batter and the texture of mushrooms complement each other. This pakoda is very easy to make snack which can be made instantly.
#pakoda #crispypakoda #pakodarecipe 

Friends, please do try this crispy pakoda recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients for making crispy Mushroom  Pakoda:
250 g Mushroom
1 Onion
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
4 Green chillies
1 tsp crushed Ginger
Curry leaves
1 cup besan flour
1/4 tsp Rice flour
1 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
required Salt
Oil for Frying

snippet.title: Ceylon Parotta Recipe in Tamil | How to make Ceylon Parotta at home in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make make Ceylon Parotta recipe at home in tamil. This Ceylon parotta is a type of veechu parotta made by folding multiple layers to create a flaky and soft parotta. This parotta has a very different taste and texture due to the folded layers.
#ceylonparotta #veechuparotta #parotta 

Friends, please do try this ceylon parotta recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients for Ceylon Parotta:
Makes 5-6 Parotta
2 cup Maida (250 g)
1/2 tsp Sugar
1 tsp Salt or as required
1/4 cup Milk
required Water
1+2 tbsp oil
1/2 +1/2 tsp Oil for each Parotta

snippet.title: Kara Kulambu Recipe in Tamil | Onion Kara Kulambu Recipe | Athai's Special Kulambu Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Kara kulambu recipe in tamil. This spicy kara kulambu is made with small onions (chinna vengayam kara kulambu) and it pair well with rice. This kara kulambu and appalam is the ultimate lunch combination. Adding sunda vathal adds additional flavor to the kulambu but it's optional. Also, once this kulambu is prepared it can be stored for a long time and we can use it as a ready to serve kulambu. 
#karakulambu #pulikuzhambu #onionkulambu

Friends, please do try this kara kulambu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
For Masala:
2 tsp Rice
1 tsp Oil
1 small piece asafoetida
1/2 tsp Fenugreek seeds
1/2 tsp pepper
2 tsp Cumin seeds
2 tsp Channa dal
2 tsp Urad dal
6 tsp Coriander seeds
1/2 tsp Oil
10 dry red chillies

For kara kulambu masala:
1 tbsp Oil
20 small Onion
15 Garlic cloves
2 small Tomatoes
1 lemon sized Tamarind

For Kara Kulambu:
4-5 tbsp Oil
1 tsp Mustard seeds
1/2 tsp Urad dal
3 dry red chillies
curry leaves

snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make chop suey recipe in tamil. This chop suey is made in american style with caramelized onions and sauce and crispy fried noodles. snippet.title: Diwali Murukku Recipe in Tamil | Diwali Palagaram Recipe | Crispy Murukku Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make diwali murukku recipe in tamil. These crispy murukkus are a great snack during the festival season. These crispy treats go well with tea / coffee and they can be made instantly. When frying the murukku we have to make sure that the oil temperature is medium, if the oil is too hot the exterior of the murukku will get cooked too fast and start to burn before the inside of the murukku gets crispy.
#murukkurecipe #diwalisnackrecipe #diwalimurukku 

Friends, please do try this diwali murukku recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: approximately 40 murukku.

1.2 cup Urad dal
1/4 cup Roasted Channa dal(pottu kadalai)
3 cup Rice flour (idiyappam maavu)
1 tbsp Sesame seeds
1/2 tsp Asafoetida
2.25 tsp Salt or as required
2 tbsp hot oil or butter
required boiling water
Oil for Frying

snippet.title: Sweet Box for Diwali | Diwali Sweet Recipes in Tamil | 4 Sweets for this Diwali
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make four sweets for making a sweet box for diwali. We are going to make mysore pak, Badhusha, Milk sweet and Ladoo. Diwali is a festival of lights and sharing sweets with friends and neighbors. Make these sweet recipes at home and share the joy of diwali. 
Please do try these recipes at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

1.5 cup Sugar (300 g)

Ingredients for Badusha:

1 tsp Sugar

 Yellow food color
 required Water
 Oil for frying 
1.5 cup Sugar (300g)

1/8 tsp Cardamom powder

snippet.title: Kulcha Recipe in Tamil | How to make Kulcha at home in Tamil | Butter Kulcha Recipe without yeast
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make butter kulcha recipe at home in tamil. This is a soft version of kulcha which can be made without using yeast. These butter kulchas can be served hot with any gravy of choice and these make a wonderful dinner recipe. The addition of curd in the recipe adds a sharp flavor and also increases the softness of the kulchas.
#kulcha #kulcharecipe #dinnerrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this soft and fluffy kulcha recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 7-8 Kulcha
2 cup Maida(250 g)
1/4 cup Curd
1 tsp Baking powder
1/4 tsp Baking Soda
1/2 tsp Salt (or as required)
1/2 cup Water (or as required)
1 tbsp Oil

For seasoning:
1 tbsp minced Garlic
2 Green chilies
1/4 cup Coriander leaves
2 tbsp Ghee or Butter
pinch of Salt

snippet.title: Cream Jamun Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make cream jamun recipe in tamil. In this recipe we are going to make bread jamuns and then slice them up and fill it with Khoya (cream). The flavor of the khoya / cream cuts through the sweetness of the jamun and elevates the recipe to a more delicate flavor.

Friends, please do try this combination recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Step 1: Sugar syrup:
1 cup Sugar(200 g)
1 cup Water (250 ml)
3 Cardamom
5-6 drops of Lemon juice

For Jamun:
8 slice Bread
1/4 tsp Baking soda
4 tbsp Milk

For Cream Filling:
1/4 cup Milk
1/2 cup Sugar syrup from step 1
2 tbsp Ghee
1 cup Milk powder(100 g)

snippet.title: Tres Leches Cake recipe in Tamil | Triple Milk Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Tres Leches cake recipe in tamil. Tres Leches Cake is a popular cake from Mexico which is made with three types of milk, condensed milk, evaporated milk and milk. This cake is soaked with flavor and is super moist and basically melts in the mouth. In this modified recipe, I have used whipping cream instead of evaporated milk. 

#treslechescake #treslechescakerecipe #cakerecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this tres leches cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

For eggless sponge cake recipe: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5NrYqZCjpN0

Ingredients:
For base sponge cake:
4 Eggs
1/2 + 1/4 cup Sugar
6 tbsp Milk
1 tsp Vanilla extract
1 cup Maida
1 tsp Baking powder
pinch of Salt
Bake at 350 F /175 C for 25 min (9 inch pan)
In cooker it takes approximately 30 min on medium Low heat

For 3 Milk Layer:
1/2 cup whipping Cream
1/2 cup Condensed Milk
1 cup Milk

For Cream layer:
1.5 cup Whipping Cream
4 tbsp powdered Sugar

snippet.title: KFC style Cauliflower Recipe in Tamil | Bucket Cauliflower | KFC Fried Cauliflower in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make KFC chicken style cauliflower recipe in Tamil. The taste and the coating of this is recipe is very similar to KFC bucket chicken but it is made from cauliflower. Blanching the cauliflower for 3 minutes softens it a bit and also cleans it. But make sure you don't heat it too long so as to preserve the texture. We can make crumbs in the batter and then double coating the cauliflowers packs the crispy coating onto the cauliflower. 
#cauliflowerrecipe #cauliflowerfry #cauliflowerfryintamil 

Friends, please do try this bucket cauliflower recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 medium sized Cauliflower
1 cup Milk
1 tsp Chilli powder
1 tsp Pepper powder
2 tsp Garlic paste
1/2 tsp lemon juice
2 tsp Salt
1 Egg (optional)

localized.title: KFC style Cauliflower Recipe in Tamil | Bucket Cauliflower | KFC Fried Cauliflower in Tamil

In this video we will see how to make KFC chicken style cauliflower recipe in Tamil. The taste and the coating of this is recipe is very similar to KFC bucket chicken but it is made from cauliflower. snippet.title: Navarathna Kurma Recipe in Tamil | நவரத்தின குருமா
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make navarathna kurma recipe in tamil. Navratan kurma is a famous mughlai vegetable curry made with a variety of spices and grains. It has a range of textures and flavors. It has mixed vegetable, dried nuts and fruits. This kurma can be served with chapathi or naan.
#navratankorma #Navarathnakurma #kurmarecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this navarathna kurma recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 tbsp Oil
8 Cashews
1 tbsp Raisins
1 Bay leaf
1 Cinnamon
2 Cardamom
2 Cloves
1/2 tsp fennel
1 Onion
1 Carrot ------------------------------- 1
1/4 Cauliflower---------------------2
6 Beans--------------------------------3
1/4 cup Green Peas-------------4
1 Potato-------------------------------5
3 Green Chillies
Panner cubes ----------------------6
required Water
required Salt
Coriander leaves 

For Grinding:
1 tsp Poppy seeds
12 Cashews
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
1 tsp Pepper
1/2 cup Coconut

10 Pineapple pieces------7
10 Grapes----------------------8
roasted nuts------------------9

snippet.title: Turkish Sweet Puffs Recipe | Baklava Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make baklava recipe in tamil. Baklava is a layered sweet recipe with thin, flaky puff pastry which is layered with nuts and then soaked in a sugar syrup. This is a very popular Turkish recipe and it usually served as a dessert marking an end to the meal. The rich sweetness of baklava is cut through by the texture of nuts and the crispiness of the pastry layers.
#baklava #baklavarecipe #sweetrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this baklava sweet recipe in tamil and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For the dough:
2.5 cup Maida
1/4 tsp Salt
1 tbsp Lemon juice
Water

Nuts Filling:
50g Almonds
50g Pistachios 

For Sugar Syrup:
1.25 cup Sugar
1.25 cup Water
1 tsp Lemon Juice

125 g unsalted Butter
Bake at 350 F /175 C for 50-55 min
tags: how to make baklava recipe in tamil

snippet.title: Masala Thattai Recipe in Tamil | How to make Thattai at home in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make thattai recipe at home in tamil. These masala thattai are super cripsy and full of flavor. The thickness of the thattais should not be too thick that they don't cook fully / crisp up and they thickness should not be too thin that they get burnt while frying. Thattais are a perfect snack to be served alongside tea/ coffee.
#Thattai #thattairecipe #thattairecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this thattai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 tbsp pottu kadalai
4 garlic cloves
1 tsp pepper
1 tsp Cumin seeds
2 tbsp Channa dal (soaked for 1 hr)
1 cup Rice flour
curry leaves
1/2-3/4 tsp Chilli powder
1/8 tsp Asafoetida
required Salt
required Water
1 tbsp hot Oil

snippet.title: Bakery Style Nei Biscuit Recipe in Tamil | கண்ணாடி ஜாடி பிஸ்கட் | Ghee Biscuit Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make nei biscuit recipe in tamil. This bakery style nei biscuit is soft and fluffy on the outside with a hard crunchy interior. This biscuit tastes just like the glass jar biscuits at local bakery shops. We can make these biscuits either in the oven or without oven in a pressure cooker.
#NeiBiscuit #gheebiscuit #BakingRecipesinTamil

Friends, please do try this nei biscuit recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: 
1/3 cup Sugar (75 g/ 6 tbsp) 
3 Cardamom 
pinch of Salt 
pinch of Baking soda 
1 cup Maida 
1/2 cup Ghee (1 tbsp less than 1/2 cup) (100g) 
Divide into 12 and Bake at 300 F / 150 C for 18 min

snippet.title: Paper Sweet recipe in Tamil | Thin Flaky Paper Sweet | Pootharekulu Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make paper sweet recipe in tamil. We are going to use raw rice slurry to make thin and flaky paper like sheets and then fold them with sweet and nuts. Traditionally the paper sheet is made by pouring the mixture over a large pot but we can easily replicate the procedure with a large tawa pan.
#PaperSweet #Pootharekulu #sweetrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this paper sweet recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Makes 10 sweet:
Ingredients:
1 cup Raw Rice(200 g)
required Water
15 Almonds
15 Pistachios
15 Cashews
1/2 cup Sugar
cardamom seeds
melted Ghee

snippet.title: Bakery Style Pakoda Recipe in Tamil | How to make Pakoda at Home in Tamil | Tea time Pakoda Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make bakery style pakoda at home in tamil. These pakodas are a great combination with tea/coffee during evenings. They are crispy on the outside and the caramelized onion flavor cuts through the snack recipe. The temperature of oil is critical to make sure the pakodas are fully cooked through without browning.
#Pakoda #pakodarecipe #pakodarecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this pakoda recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients for making Bakery style Pakoda:
1.5 cup Chickpea flour /  Kadalai maavu
1/4 cup Rice flour / Arisi maavu
1 Onion 
3 garliccloves(crushed)
2 Green Chilies 
1/2 tsp Fennel seeds
2 spring Curry leaves
1/8 tsp Turmeric powder
1 tsp Chili powder
1/4 tsp Asafoetida
1/2 cup broken peanuts
1 tsp Salt or to taste
2 tbsp hot oil
required Water
Oil for frying
